line.originaltext: 1 pound sliced bacon, cut into thirds
line.annotation: create_ing(ing0, "1 pound sliced bacon, cut into thirds")
create_ing(ing1, "1 (14 ounce) package beef cocktail wieners")

line.originaltext: 3/4 cup brown sugar, or to taste
line.annotation: create_ing(ing2, "3/4 cup brown sugar, or to taste")

line.originaltext: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
Refrigerate 2/3 of the bacon until needed.
line.annotation: separate(ing0, ing3, "2/3 bacon", ing4, "1/2 bacon", "refridgerate 2/3 bacon")

line.originaltext: Wrap each cocktail wiener with a piece of bacon and secure with a toothpick.
line.annotation: combine({ing1, ing3}, ing5, "wrapped wieners", "wrap with bacon")

line.originaltext: Wrap each cocktail wiener with a piece of bacon and secure with a toothpick.
line.annotation: combine({ing4, ing5}, ing6, "wrapped weiners", "wrap with bacon")

line.originaltext: Wrap each cocktail wiener with a piece of bacon and secure with a toothpick.
Wrap each cocktail wiener with a piece of bacon and secure with a toothpick.
line.annotation: do(ing6, t1, ing7, "secured weiners", "secure with toothpicks")

line.originaltext: Place on a large baking sheet.
Sprinkle brown sugar generously over all.
Bake for 40 minutes in the preheated oven, until the sugar is bubbly.
Bake for 40 minutes in the preheated oven, until the sugar is bubbly.
To serve, place the wieners in a slow cooker and keep on the low setting.
